data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Henry, Charles S., Brooks, Stephen J., Johnson, James B., Haruyama, Naoto, Duelli, Peter, Mochizuki, Atsushi (2015): A new East-Asian species in the Chrysoperla carnea - group of cryptic lacewing species (Neuroptera: Chrysopidae) based on distinct larval morphology and a unique courtship song. Zootaxa 3918 (2): 194-208, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3918.2.2
